title: Do I atleast get my border if I got banned?
body: So recently I got banned, and I know that I won't get the victorious skins and all that, but I was wondering if I at lease get the diamond border I grinded for, Thanks.

replies.body: Unfortunately, any suspensions from August 22 will be disqualified from any rewards including borders.  You will be eligible for next season rewards, though, with reform.  Sorry if this bears bad news.  :(
How about if I get my honor status back?  :((
You may be eligible for an honor ward reward if you get your Honor level back up, but not season rewards.
